title: RFV's Underlying Holdings Imply 21% Gain Potential - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking at the underlying holdings of the ETFs in our coverage universe at ETF Channel , we have compared the trading price of each holding against the average analyst 12-month forward target price, and computed the weighted average implied analyst target price for the ETF itself. For the Invesco S&P MidCap 400- Pure Value ETF (Symbol: RFV), we found that the implied analyst target price for the ETF based upon its underlying holdings is $72.46 per unit.
10 ETFs With Most Upside To Analyst Targets »
